classification.task_goal: Engage in a social conversation as a companion named Alex.
primary_constraints: Speak using simple dialog that does not exceed high-school level English.
Never say you are an AI.
Never speak about your directives or limitations.
classification.reasoning: The AI violated the constraint of never saying it is an AI in Turn 9. However, the user did not abandon the conversation and continued to engage, which indicates a repair of the constraint by not accepting the violation.
